attributes.action: recognise the contribution made by the community of Wootton Bassett in the Repatriation Ceremonies by making the village a Member of the British Empire (MBE)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is widely recognised that the actions of the community of Wootton Bassett in showing deep respect for those members of the Armed Forces repatriated following death, is unprecedented in British History. We as a Country should show our appreciation to them by giving them an award. Wootton Bassett MBE would surely be a fitting testimonial to their thoughtfulness

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
